bibl.title: Schedule of Work Days.
Papyrological Texts in Honor of Roger S. Bagnall

bibl.note: Appointment of two groups of ὑπηρέται for non-consecutive days of work, which are identified by both their planetary and Judaeo-Christian names. Oxyrhynchite (?), IV(?) AD. - The days of the week in Greek documentary sources.
bibl.seg: Rodney Ast, Schedule of Work Days.

Rodney Ast, Hélène Cuvigny, Todd M. Hickey & Julia Lougovaya (edd.), Papyrological Texts in Honor of Roger S. Bagnall = American Studies in Papyrology. 53 (Durham, North Carolina, 2013) pp. 9-16, 1 fig.

Appointment of two groups of ὑπηρέται for non-consecutive days of work, which are identified by both their planetary and Judaeo-Christian names. Oxyrhynchite (?), IV(?) AD. - The days of the week in Greek documentary sources.
